coreAtributes.name: heart pasty
coreAtributes.description: A pair of heart-shaped nipple pasties.

displacementText.playerSelf: You wince as you peel the heart pasties off your [pc.nipples].
displacementText.playerNPC: [npc.Name] winces and lets out a little cry as you peel the heart pasties off [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: [npc.Name] winces and [npc.moansVerb+] as you roughly tear the heart pasties off [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] winces as [npc.she] peels the heart pasties off [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: You wince and let out a little cry as [npc.name] peels the heart pasties off your [pc.nipples].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: You wince and [pc.moanVerb+] as [npc.name] roughly tears the heart pasties off your [pc.nipples].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc2.Name] winces and lets out a little cry as [npc1.name] peels the heart pasties off [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc2.Name] winces and [npc2.moansVerb+] as [npc1.name] roughly tears the heart pasties off [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples].

replacementText.playerSelf: You stick the heart pasties over your [pc.nipples].
replacementText.playerNPC: You stick the heart pasties over [npc.name]'s [npc.nipples].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You stick the heart pasties over [npc.name]'s [npc.nipples].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] sticks the heart pasties over your [pc.nipples].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] sticks the heart pasties over your [pc.nipples].
